hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
# Updated to use Docker Hub DB_REPO_URI=3750945/mariadb
# Docker Hub login (consider a more secure approach for credentials) echo "040421Ed!" | docker login --username 3750945 --password-stdin
# Build and push to Docker Hub docker build -t $DB_REPO_URI:latest . docker push $DB_REPO_URI:latest
APP_NAMESPACE_NAME=store-app kubectl create namespace $APP_NAMESPACE_NAME || echo "$APP_NAMESPACE_NAME already exists, skipping"
# Apply Kubernetes configurations kubectl apply -f mariadb-deploy.yml kubectl apply -f mariadb-service.yml
# Restart deployment kubectl rollout restart -n $APP_NAMESPACE_NAME deployment/mariadb-deploy
